description: Adds one or more tags to the specified Amazon Lightsail resource. Each resource can have a maximum of 50 tags. Each tag consists of a key and an optional value. Tag keys must be unique per resource. For more information about tags, see the Lightsail Dev Guide. The tag resource operation supports tag-based access control via request tags and resource tags applied to the resource identified by resourceName. For more information, see the Lightsail Dev Guide.
